attributes.description: The name of the software mentioned in the text
Application is computer software package that performs a specific function for an end user or another

examples: Opera Software also implemented the Nintendo DS Browser for Nintendo's handheld system
Mighty Bomb Jack (, Maiti Bon Jakku) is a 1986 Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) game released by Tecmo, which was later ported to the Amiga, Atari ST and Commodore 64.
